entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 09:25 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.9°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.9°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
